With the intention of providing you with some fixed income during my lifetime, I hereby grant you as my stepfather
: You are my daughter. In the natural affection I have for you,
| that is, the vacant land which has been inherited, from the date of the acquisition to this day
my full right of possession is in the possession of no one else except me, and that there are no mortgages or other encumbrances. With the intention of transferring the said vacant land to you, I hereby transfer the said property, which I value as described in detail in paragraph 3 of the Schedule below, to you free of charge with all rights and without any consideration from you, for the sum of Rs. 4,62,000/- (literally four lakhs and sixty-two thousand rupees) without any consideration. From now on, you shall be the sole owner of this property and shall enjoy it freely with all rights, including the right to inheritance, donation, sale, and enjoyment of the said property. From now on, you shall pay the taxes due on the said property. Neither you nor your heirs, nor I nor my heirs shall ever have any dispute over this. This is a settlement document written in your name and giving my consent.
Schedule:
All the land in the village of Jonnavalasa, included in the Jagannadhapuram Revenue Division, Vizianagaram West Suburi District, Vizianagaram Mandal, Vizianagaram District, forming part of Gram Kantham Survey No. 84, details of the vacant land, dimensions and boundaries

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 4311 of 2025, dated 25/Jun/2025, executed by Lenka Towdamma in favour of her Daughter, Akali Uma towards the property admeasuring an extent of 128.33 Sq.Yds, comprised in survey number 84 part, situated in Jonnavalasa Village, Jagannadhapuram Revenue, Vijayanagaram Mandal, within the District of Vizianagaram, registered at sub-registrar office Vijayanagaram (WEST)(213), is bounded as follows: North by: Vacant site and Rekula shed of Lenka Sattibabu South by:C.C. Road. East by: Rastha and RCC slab house of Piridi Apparao West by: Tiled house of Gumpa Ramana. Note:*Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
